subject: Creatives for display at the Fascia below NH Structures - reg.
text: HRay 754 WTHRf giferas<ot (Tsw 4dev &r TTTHf #ET4, IRa FRGT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Tr444 va 6f-5 & 6, #qzr-10, ERQT, # fcrlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 RM /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI /Policy Guidelines /Advertisement /2025 Policy Circular No.4.35/ 2025 dated 07th February, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. MEDIA-11012(14)/1/2025- Media Relation (Comp. No. 270962)} Sub: Creatives for display at the Fascia below NH Structures reg: NHAI is constructing large number of Structures on National Highways. The Fascia while crossing below these Structures remains unutilized. It has, therefore, been decided to Paint/ Print messages relating to Road Safety and other related matters at Toll Plazas, Wayside Amenities, Fascia while crossing below VOPs, VUPs, FOBs. 2. Creatives on following Nine themes have been developed and are attached herewith (Annexure-I): (i) Drive in the Speed Limit: (ii) Don't Drink & Drive (iii) Lane Driving (iv) Rajmaarg Yatra App for Information, Complaint, Suggestion related to Highways (v) 1033 Helpline (vi) Wear Seatbelt while Driving (vii)  Rajmaarg Yatra App for Toll Plaza related information (viii) Rajmaarg Yatra App for Restaurant, Petrol Pump and Hospital related information (ix) Don't Drive in Wrong Direction 3 All Field Offices of NHAI are requested to utilize this space for display of these creatives to create awareness among Road Users. The creatives may be adapted in the required Size and Regional Language to accommodate one or two themetic creatives. 4. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
